comments.text: When am feeling sad i always come here,because i missed all my loved ones,especially my mother feel like seeing her and pour out all my pains and tears to her..only she can understand how am feeling..Vero my mother u broke my heart when u left me,daddy left with u as well.and my two brothers also..life isn't the same💔💔💔💔💔
